# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    wrapped = ""
    current_width = 0

    for word in words
        if current_width + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            wrapped = append!(wrapped, "\n")
            current_width = 0
        end
        current_width += length(word) + 1
        wrapped = append!(wrapped, word , " ")
    end

    return trim(wrapped)
end


# Example
text = "This is a long string that will be wrapped."
wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
println(wrapped_text)

```
